question: The Kovvada Atomic Power Plant Project has been proposed in which state?
explanation: With an aim to make Andhra Pradesh the country's nuclear power hub, government recently proposed Kovvada Atomic Power plant to be set up in Andhra Pradesh. The construction work is estimated to start in 2018 and the production to begin by 2024. Out of installation capacity of 6,600 MW produced at the plant, 3,300 MW will be allocated to AP at affordable rates.
